● Worked on over 250 long-form written lesson assets, mostly on cultural history and art history topics. Topics ranged from the band Queen to Ancient Roman portraiture.', 'title': 'Content Outline Writer', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}]}, {'company': {'id': 42129704, 'name': 'Gaiali', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHt1TKV9bMnqA/company-logo_400_400/0/1668623235957?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=ZFjxx40SyEKRRe6UDihUjaFyWk5M_5KlBtjPbdMlfk4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/gaiali/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Yuno', 'description': '●Write engaging audio scripts on famous artists and other topics in art history.
●Research material for the scripts and properly cited sources.
●Create pronunciation guides to aid voice actors during the narration of audio scripts.
●Collaborate with Gaiali editors to ensure content is accurate and entertaining.', 'title': 'Audio Script Writer', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}]}, {'company': {'id': 166707, 'name': 'Unum', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQE5vvRhmkCapg/company-logo_400_400/0/1688240148753?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=QDg0cWL7nZoYusbo9D-kUi2FECKAc95YSIN9AKx5NmM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/unum/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'South Portland, Maine, United States', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Unum', 'description': '●Applied contract/policy knowledge and analyzed technical and complex contractual knowledge (policies and provisions) to ensure appropriate eligibility requirements and liability decisions.
●Verified ongoing liability and develop strategies for return-to-work opportunities as appropriate.
●Produced objective, clear documentation, and technical rationale for all claim determinations.
●Provided timely and excellent customer service by paying appropriate claims promptly and quickly responding to all inquiries.', 'title': 'Benefit Specialist Trainee - Short Term Disability', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 11478035, 'name': 'Rufus Porter Museum of Art and Ingenuity', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQH7BRHqLlHdOA/company-logo_400_400/0/1593107224594?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=y7QIfZav0eVecQvxt73Ze5z7gNQBwU8G47hiF6fFDls', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/rufus-porter-museum/', 'employees': {'start': 0, 'end': 1}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Bridgton, Maine, United States', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Rufus Porter Museum of Art and Ingenuity', 'description': '•	Crafted a child-friendly version of the Rufus Porter Museum experience, designed and hosted the ""Curious Arts and Interesting Experiments"" kids activity series, and created additional education programs for k-12 students.
•	Assisted with the organization and execution of special events, including a season opening preview party and garden tour fundraiser.
•	Produced press releases and other material for public distribution. 
•	Served as a docent giving tours of the museum collection and helped operate the museum gift shop.', 'title': '2021 Dorothy W. Sanborn Summer Intern', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 42628, 'name': 'John Cabot University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFqYbcKjIoQJQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856800140?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qczxFmGVxafYOyif5ozh3NjcQWqyi0DS1dsWJ-p9xA4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/john-cabot-university/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rome, Latium, Italy', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'John Cabot University', 'description': 'Performed a graduate-level internship focused on continuing and cataloging the findings of John Cabot University’s research on the history of the complex of buildings at Via della Lungara 233 (an architectural palimpsest with walls dating back to the 3rd century that presently serves as John Cabot University’s Guarini Campus).  Additional research was performed at numerous Roman archives, including the municipal Archivio Storico Capitolino and the national Archivio Centrale dello Stato. The findings were organized into a coherent collection with Microsoft Sharepoint, the various architectural layers of the complex were visualized using Google MyMaps, and the basic outline for a potential future public exhibition was planned.', 'title': 'Guarini Campus Archive Internship', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 42628, 'name': 'John Cabot University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFqYbcKjIoQJQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856800140?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qczxFmGVxafYOyif5ozh3NjcQWqyi0DS1dsWJ-p9xA4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/john-cabot-university/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rome, Latium, Italy', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'John Cabot University', 'description': 'Organized and executed a public panel discussion about the United Nations World Food Programme’s use of visual art to communicate the agency’s life-saving mission.  The panel included a graduate student from the John Cabot University’s MA Art History Program, a faculty member from John Cabot University’s Communications Department, and the director of the WFP director of Television and Film Communications.', 'title': 'Student Organizer', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}, {'location': 'Colli sul Velino, Italy', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'John Cabot University', 'description': 'Helped organize and execute Bronze Age Now, an ""archaeo-performance"" exhibition that allowed contemporary artists (Dennis Balk, Emilio Corti, DJ Cilloman, Jeremy Deller, Miltos Manetas, Nathaniel Mellors, Jonathan Monk, & Haim Steinbach) to showcase contemporary interventions alongside recently discovered bronze age artifacts at the Colli sul Velino Antiquarium.', 'title': 'Exhibition Organizer', 'employment_type': 'Internship'}]}, {'company': {'id': 42628, 'name': 'John Cabot University', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFqYbcKjIoQJQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856800140?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=qczxFmGVxafYOyif5ozh3NjcQWqyi0DS1dsWJ-p9xA4', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/john-cabot-university/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rome Area, Italy', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'John Cabot University', 'description': '•	Checked students into the John Cabot University on-campus gym using Microsoft Access.  
•	Utilized Microsoft Excel to organize, analyze, and create graphical representations of data regarding gym usage and athletics class attendance.
•	Entered student information into the schoolwide information system (Blackbaud).  Retrieved said information when needed.
•	Promoted JCU Athletics during orientation week and instructed students on how to get a health examination with an Italian doctor.', 'title': 'Fitness Center Assistant', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Portland Science Center (Portland Exhibits LLC) -defunct-', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Portland, Maine', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Portland Science Center (Portland Exhibits LLC) -defunct-', 'description': '•	Performed basic exhibit maintenance and security.  Helped to conserve exhibit objects, including artifacts recovered from the Titanic,  plastinated bodies from Gunther von Hagens Body Worlds, and a Lunar rock.
•	Sold exhibit tickets and upsold audio guides, always scoring high on the list of employee upsell percentages.
•	Worked retail point-of-sale, suggested gifts and books to customers.
•	Operated a children’s centrifuge ride while talking to guests about the science of centrifugal force and how it can be used to simulate gravity.
•	Engaged with visitors, guided them through the exhibit, and fueled their excitement for science.', 'title': 'Exhibit Attendant', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 77817, 'name': 'Southern Maine Community College', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D560BAQFUfh8HLJRuEw/company-logo_400_400/0/1664479669196?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=glYTF9jpL1kLVYW9C_l3S4WS9PdBBAw5QIA2YmfMXoM', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/smccmaine/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'South Portland, Maine', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Southern Maine Community College', 'description': '•	Represented Southern Maine Community College to potential students and their families.
•	Led campus tours highlighting the facilities and departments of SMCC and answered questions about the school.
•	Personalized my presentation to the audience of potential students, which ranged from high school students on class college trips to retirees looking to go back to school.', 'title': 'Student Ambassador', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Harbor Fish Market', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Portland, Maine', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'Harbor Fish Market', 'description': 'Weighed, cleaned, and wrapped fresh fish and shellfish, made meal-planning suggestions, and posed with live lobsters for tourists’ photos at an iconic Italian American New England seafood market.', 'title': 'Fish Mongerer', 'employment_type': None}]}]",[],"['Proofreading', 'Originality', 'Mass Communication', 'Relationship Building', 'English Literature', 'Content Strategy', 'Content Management', 'Content Development', 'Copywriting', 'English writing', 'Writing', 'Web Content Writing', 'SEO Copywriting', 'Education', 'Claims Management', 'Disability Insurance', 'Customer Service', 'Art History', 'Citations', 'Research']",,,
